item.title: National Anthem
item.details:
Arise, O compatriots,
Nigeria's call obey
To serve our fatherland
With love and strength and faith
The labor of our heroes past
Shall never be in vain
To serve with heart and might
One nation bound in freedom,
Peace and unity.
item.author: John A.llechukwu, Eme Etim Akpan, B.A Ogunnaike, Sota Omoigui and P.O Aderibigbe

item.title: Bantu
item.details:
Arise, O compatriots,
Nigeria's call obey
To serve our fatherland
With love and strength and faith
The labor of our heroes past
Shall never be in vain
To serve with heart and might

Peace and unity.
